State.description: The current installation state of the application - AppEnvState_t

RemovalDate.description: The date/time after which the application may be removed - DateTime_t

License.description: The license under which the application is usable - License_t

Description.description: A human-readable description of the application

BestBenchmark.description: The type(s) of the benchmarks which best describe the sensitivity of this application to the performance of the ExecutionEnvironment - Benchmark_t

ParallelSupport.description: The type of supported parallel execution - ParallelSupport_t

MaxSlots.description: The maximum number of concurrent slots that may be used to run the application

MaxJobs.description: The maximum number of concurrent jobs that can run the application

MaxUserSeats.description: The maximum number of concurrent users that can run the application

FreeSlots.description: The maximum number slots currently available to run the application

FreeJobs.description: The maximum number of additional jobs that can run the application

FreeUserSeats.description: The maximum number of additional users that can run the application

ExecutionEnvironmentID.description: ID(s) of ExecutionEnvironments where this ApplicationEnvironment can be used

ComputingManagerID.description: ID of the ComputingManager this ApplicationEnvironment is associated with

ApplicationHandleID.description: ID(s) of the ApplicationHandles that can be used to refer to this environment
